title: Add contact button with email mailto link

requirements.text: Add a 'Contact Us' button in the frontend that opens a mailto link to viitjeetec@gmail.com when clicked, positioned in a visible location such as the header navigation area or the About/footer section of the landing page
acceptanceCriteria: A contact button is visible on the landing page
Clicking the button opens the user's default email client with 'To:' field pre-filled with viitjeetec@gmail.com
The button uses a mailto: link (e.g., mailto:viitjeetec@gmail.com)
Button styling is consistent with the existing warm orange theme and UI design
Button includes appropriate accessible label text in English (e.g., 'Contact Us' or 'Get in Touch')

constraints: Do not implement email-sending functionality (server-side email) as it requires a paid subscription
Use only client-side mailto: links to open the user's email application
Maintain consistency with the existing viitjee branding and warm orange visual theme
nonGoals: Building a contact form that sends emails through the backend
Implementing newsletter signup or email verification features
Adding email validation or storage in the backend
